content: Should it be a generic Observation profile in addition to the Laboratory results Observation in US Core to represent constrains on various observation not related to lab results, e.g., education level?
That is what the FHIR Observation resource is for.

IGs only define profiles for those use-cases where there's been discussion and agreement. Observation is super-broad, so trying to standardize all Observations is both hard and not necessarily super-useful (because you wouldn't be able to standardize much). That said, you can infer some basics - e.g. referring to US Core resources for the reference elements you populate
